name: Tritwin
description:
Wanted to play two games Tetris at once? No, of course not,  but with enough changes to that idea it might just work. 

Tritwin is a falling block puzzle where you play two boards and once and the pieces are Joined Together. Instead of rotating  you can flip vertically or swap the pieces between sides.

Current high score (submit your own):
deviledtheg - 5300

Font by Wuksy
